===Multi-tiered system===
===Multi-tiered system===
â
The ''expert wiki'', is expected to be written and managed by experts. <ref name="sanger-blog-du-2006">Larry Sanger, [http://www.dufoundation.org/blog/?p=8 "The Digital Universe in 2006"], Digital Universe Blog, [[January 20]], [[2006]], accessed May 16, 2007</ref>
+
The ''expert wiki'', is expected to be written and managed by experts. <ref name="sanger-blog-du-2006">[[Larry Sanger]], [http://www.dufoundation.org/blog/?p=8 "The Digital Universe in 2006"], Digital Universe Blog, [[January 20]], [[2006]], accessed May 16, 2007</ref>
The ''public wiki'', will be editable by members of the educated public. However, according to Sanger, only registered users who have provided their [[real name]]s will be permitted to edit this wiki, unlike Wikipedia. <ref name="sanger-blog-du-2006"/> According to Sanger, an article rating system will be used for articles in the public wiki. <ref>Larry Sanger, [http://www.dufoundation.org/blog/?p=9 "Correcting Some Misconceptions about the Digital Universe"], Digital Universe Blog, [[January 19]], [[2006]], accessed May 16, 2007</ref>
The ''public wiki'', will be editable by members of the educated public. However, according to Sanger, only registered users who have provided their [[real name]]s will be permitted to edit this wiki, unlike Wikipedia. <ref name="sanger-blog-du-2006"/> According to Sanger, an article rating system will be used for articles in the public wiki. <ref>Larry Sanger, [http://www.dufoundation.org/blog/?p=9 "Correcting Some Misconceptions about the Digital Universe"], Digital Universe Blog, [[January 19]], [[2006]], accessed May 16, 2007</ref>
